attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: First off I would like to start by saying my phone got some weird virus right after downloading. This app also has been providing me with FAKE NEWS and showing the wrong information. I give this one star because the hacking and it’s a disgrace. Thank you for reading this do not recommend🛥

attributes.title: Truly awful✨🧚
attributes.review:
The app took so long to download i actually decided to burn down my house for entertainment
And once I opened the app, I threw up because of the hideous opening screen! I proceeded to give Trump a makeover instead of imputing my phone number (ps, isn’t he married, he shouldn’t be asking for our numbers)

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever used
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and support the greatest president ever 🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷 but I was sadly misinformed about the quality of the app. It took forever to download and when it finally did I couldn’t even log in. It’s riddled with glitches and I can’t believe it even runs at all. Do not download.

attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates and was beyond disappointed. It took 20hrs to download. The layout and design looks like it was made by a child. It deleted all of my pictures and videos. My phone kept glitching and freezing until I deleted the app. DO NOT download!! 🤢

attributes.title: WORSE APP LUV <3 😍🥰🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: 💕😡😻ever since i downloaded this james charles has been climbing up my walls.. it’s very concerning. anyways, all the children in my basement have gone missing, i spent two hours a day buying them from dollar tree and your telling me THEIR GONE?! this is a really bad app and work we live in 🙄 i’d like a refund please, thank you. 🧚‍♀️💕🥰

attributes.title: STAY SAFE THIS APP WILL RECORD YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. 😖i tried downloading it and it took 13 hours to finally load, and then sucked up 18GB of my storage!! 😨it then asked for my personal information and started sending me creepy text messages after entering in my phone number!!🤬🤬 DELETE THIS APP NOW EVERYONE STAY SAFE DONT ENTER YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION❗️❗️❗️

attributes.title: Terrible just terrible
attributes.review: I tried to download this app 2 weeks ago and it just now downloaded. Every time i open the app it glitches and exits out. All I want to do is support the president but the app just doesn’t work. Anytime I open it, it logs off. Very disappointed and upset. This app should not exist

attributes.title: I wish I could give this app a 1 star!
attributes.review: This app is dangerous plain and simple! It gave my phone so many viruses, it won’t stop acting up. The app need to be deleted to protect other people who think they should get this app. Donald trumps app is dangerous do not get it unless you want to have a phone full of viruses!

attributes.title: MY PHONE EXPLODED
attributes.review: I decided to download this app to try and support our President DT  ✨🌻🧚🏻🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🏼‍♀️and just like everyone else IT TOOK TWO YEARS TO DOWNLOAD!!!🤯😤😠😢 To make matters worse my phone kept freezing 🥶 AND THEN IT EXPLODED!!!!!!💥💥  I had to delete it right away because it literally killed my phone. A big thumbs down from me DT👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 if I could rate this zero stars I would 😤😒

attributes.title: awful app 😕
attributes.review: This app is super dangerous, once it asked for my phone number, I heard a weird message in trumps voice and it freaked me out!! Then it started spamming giant pics of Trump and his Cheeto skin and me and my sister were traumatized afterwards. Do. Not. Install. I almost leapt up and crashed into the wall because of the amount of fear I had. The audacity! 😡😑👎👎
